Name: assign_worker_to_task
Description: Whether a worker is assigned to a task

Name: select_feature_for_release
Description: Whether a feature is included in a release

Name: set_sprint_duration
Description: Duration of a sprint in days

Name: assign_skill_to_worker
Description: Whether a skill is assigned to a worker

Name: set_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Achievement status of a sprint goal

Name: set_stakeholder_relevance
Description: Relevance of a feature to a stakeholder

Name: set_velocity_avg
Description: Average story points completed per sprint
